channel.title: How to make an Interface? Will REP++
channel.description: Title says it all, i'm trying to make it so when I click on an object it will bring up a picture with 3 different pictures in the middle like this [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/25yuqv6.png[/img] and when I click 1, 2, or 3 it will give you a certain item. I just need the "How to make an Interface" part right now. All help appreciated thank you!
